event_log.narration: The party stands before the entrance of the crypt, a grand stone structure adorned with ancient carvings.

event_log.detail: Shadow successfully sneaks past the entrance undetected and sees what's inside.

details.note: The interior of the crypt is dark and musty, with cobwebs covering the walls. A faint glow emanates from torches on the walls, casting flickering shadows around the room. The air is thick with the smell of decay and rot.
Elara and Shadow investigate the noise source in a side corridor, 20 feet away from their current position.

event_log.action: Use Channel Divinity to sense undead

details.note: You sense a faint aura of undeath emanating from within the room.

event_log.action: Roll Perception to determine noise source

details.note: You sense a faint aura of undeath emanating from within the room. It seems we have a possible undead creature on our hands.
